com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.setup

Class GameConfigActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.setup.GameConfigActivity

  • public class GameConfigActivity
extends Activity
    Allows the user to set the names, colors, and number of players, board size, and other options.

      • editName

        public void editName(View view)
        Enables editing the name corresponding to the button pressed, if it is owned by the user.
        Parameters:
        view - The button pressed to begin editing the name.

      • toggleStatus

        public void toggleStatus(View view)
        Toggles between legal status based on the context including current state and whether the corresponding player is owned by the user.
        Parameters:
        view - The button being toggled.

      • openPalette

        public void openPalette(View view)
        Opens a palette so the user can choose a color for the corresponding player.
        Parameters:
        view - The button displaying the current color.

      • goToGame

        public void goToGame(View view)
        Uploads all game configuration information to the intent for the * .MainGameActivity.
        Parameters:
        view - The Begin Game button.

      • defaultExtras

        public static Bundle defaultExtras()
        Defines the minimum extras needed in case a null Bundle is passed with the Intent.
        Returns:
        A bundle with minimum extras for this activity. Position is 0.
